Title: Constrained Bayesian Optimization for Load Sharing Optimization for Parallel and Serial Compressor Stations
Biography: Visiting student researcher within the Autonomous Industrial System Labs, my works focuses on the role of Artificial Intelligence to make compressor stations safer and more efficient.

Title: Pumped Thermal Energy Storage Systems and their Application in Power System Integration
Biography: Visiting Student Researcher investigating pumped thermal energy storage (PTES) systems and their application in power system integration. My research aims to optimize energy storage technologies for enhanced renewable energy utilization and operation.
